com.dua3.meja.model

Interface Sheet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Row>, java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericSheet, PoiSheet

    public interface Sheet
extends java.lang.Iterable<Row>, java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock
    An interface representing a single sheet of a workbook.

      • splitAt

        void splitAt(int i,
             int j)
        Split (freeze) view. Splits the sheet so that rows above i and columns to the left of j remain in view when scrolling.
        Parameters:
        i - row number
        j - column number

      • getSplitRow
